data.name: Deathpool
data.description: The daughter of the cosmic entity known as Death and, uh... Deadpool? Okay, wow. Deathpool combines her father's love of brawling with her mother's incredible supernatural powers.

starItems.name: Deathpool
starItems.description: The daughter of the cosmic entity known as Death and, uh... Deadpool? Okay, wow. Deathpool combines her father's love of brawling with her mother's incredible supernatural powers.

1.description:
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>80%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
If enemy is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage instead.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage if target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>

2.description:
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
If enemy is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage instead.

This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade:
Clear all negative effects on this character
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage if target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>

3.description:
Clear all negative effects on this character.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
If enemy is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>260%</color> damage instead.

This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
If any negative effects are removed, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage if target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>

4.description:
Clear all negative effects on this character. If any negative effects are removed, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
If enemy is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>320%</color> damage instead.

This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage if target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>

5.description:
Clear all negative effects on this character. If any negative effects are removed, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
If enemy is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>400%</color> damage instead.

This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>80%</color> damage if target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> on primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Clear all negative effects on this character. If any negative effects are removed, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
<color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> on primary and adjacent targets.
If enemy is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>480%</color> damage instead.

This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>60%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>120%</color> damage if target is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>
Always flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> on primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Clear all negative effects on this character. If any negative effects are removed, heal self for <color=#86e619>5%</color> per negative effect removed.
Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health.

Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>.
Flip <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color> on primary and adjacent targets.
If enemy is a <color=#fff568>MINION</color>, attack that enemy for <color=#86e619>600%</color> damage instead.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from this character to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>70%</color> damage.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from primary and adjacent targets and redistribute to self and all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies

2.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from this character to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage.

Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from primary and adjacent targets and redistribute to self and all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> negative effect from this character to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>110%</color> damage.

Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from primary and adjacent targets and redistribute to self and all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
3.nextUpgrade:
Transfer <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from this character to the primary target
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

4.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from this character to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.

Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from all enemies and redistribute to self and all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Spread all negative effects, except <color=#fff568>Stun</color>, from the primary target to all adjacent targets

5.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from this character to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>170%</color> damage.

Steal <color=#86e619>10%</color> Health from primary and adjacent targets and redistribute to self and all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.

Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
5.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Steal +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Health from primary and adjacent targets

6.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>3</color> negative effects from this character to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>220%</color> damage.

Steal <color=#86e619>15%</color> Health from primary and adjacent targets and redistribute to self and all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.

Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.
6.nextUpgrade:
Transfer all negative effects from this character to the primary target
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

7.description:
Transfer all negative effects from this character to the primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage. Attack all adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>270%</color> damage.

Steal <color=#86e619>15%</color> Health from primary and adjacent targets and redistribute to self and all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies.

Spread all negative effects from the primary target to all adjacent targets. This will not spread <color=#fff568>Stun</color>.

1.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, then gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If at maximum <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>20,000%</color> Piercing instead.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
 > Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> to the primary target

2.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color>, then gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If at maximum <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>20,000%</color> Piercing instead.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
 > Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>100%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns to the primary target

7.description:
Clear <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color> from primary target.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>500%</color> damage + apply <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Bleed</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns, then gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
Gain +<color=#86e619>5,000%</color> Extra Focus for this attack.

If at maximum <color=#fff568>Charged</color>:
 > Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>20,000%</color> Piercing instead.
 > Clear <color=#fff568>Charged</color>.
 > This attack is Unavoidable and cannot be blocked.
 > Characters killed by this attack cannot be revived.

1.description:
On enemy Death, Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health and attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>130%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health, apply <color=#86e619>+1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to that character.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or on <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > On enemy Death, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> or <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies or self that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Drain for each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to most injured enemy
In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>, on Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> ally
On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>, on Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> for each <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally

2.description:
On enemy Death, Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health and attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health, apply <color=#86e619>+1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to that character.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> for each <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color>:
 > On Spawn, fill Speed Bar for self and all <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> allies by +<color=#86e619>10%</color> + <color=#86e619>5%</color> for each <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> ally.

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or on <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>:
 > On Spawn, gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Charged</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>5</color>.
 > On enemy Death, generate <color=#86e619>1</color> Ability Energy for <color=#86e619>2</color> random <color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> or <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies or self that were not at full energy on start of the current turn.

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Drain for each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.
2.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to most injured enemy
Clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects from most injured enemy
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health for self and <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies

3.description:
On enemy Death, Heal self for <color=#86e619>10%</color> of Max Health and attack the most injured enemy for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage + clear <color=#86e619>3</color> positive effects.
When this character or any <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> ally drops below <color=#86e619>30%</color> Health, apply <color=#86e619>+1</color> <color=#fff568>Deathproof</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>2</color>, to that character.

On <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>:

In <color=#fff568>RAIDS</color> or on <color=#fff568>CRUCIBLE</color> <color=#fff568>OFFENSE</color>:

Gain +<color=#86e619>5%</color> Drain for each <color=#fff568>Charged</color> on this character.
Gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health. <color=#fff568>NEW WARRIOR</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>20%</color> Max Health.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to most injured enemy
<color=#fff568>MYSTIC</color> and <color=#fff568>HERO</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>10%</color> Drain

item.name: Gold
item.description: Gold is required to upgrade your character's level, abilities, and Star rank. Earn Gold in Campaign missions and Challenges.
